title: TiviMate EPG Guide - Complete Setup Tutorial
metaTitle: TiviMate EPG Setup Guide 2025 | Tutorial
description: Learn how to set up and use EPG (Electronic Program Guide) in TiviMate. Complete 2025 guide with step-by-step instructions.

content.intro: TiviMate offers excellent EPG (Electronic Program Guide) support. This guide will show you how to configure and get the most out of EPG features in TiviMate.
benefits: See what's on now and later

steps.title: Open TiviMate Settings
steps.description: Launch TiviMate and navigate to the Settings or Preferences menu.

steps.title: Find EPG Options
steps.description: Look for the EPG section in the settings. This may be under Playback, Interface, or a dedicated section.

steps.title: Configure EPG
steps.description: Adjust the EPG settings according to your preferences. Enable the feature if it's disabled.

steps.title: Save and Test
steps.description: Save your settings and test the EPG functionality by playing a channel.

faqs.question: Does TiviMate support EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, TiviMate fully supports EPG (Electronic Program Guide). You can configure it in the settings.

faqs.question: How do I enable EPG in TiviMate?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Interface and look for the EPG option.

content.conclusion: EPG (Electronic Program Guide) is a powerful feature in TiviMate that enhances your viewing experience. Follow the steps above to get it configured properly.

faqs.question: Does Xciptv Player support VOD?
faqs.answer: Yes, Xciptv Player fully supports VOD (Video on Demand). You can configure it in the settings.

faqs.question: How do I enable VOD in Xciptv Player?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Playback and look for the VOD option.

content.conclusion: VOD (Video on Demand) is a powerful feature in Xciptv Player that enhances your viewing experience. Follow the steps above to get it configured properly.
